fields.headline: Taxi 2
fields.bodyText: Luc Besson wrote and produced this follow-up to his unexpected hit comedy thriller, Taxi, with Samy Naceri back as Daniel, the Marseille taxi driver who cheerfully drives at terrifying speeds, often leaning round to chat to his gibbering fare. As with all car chase flicks, serious or otherwise, you have to suspend your disbelief regarding the zero-pedestrian-fatality rate, but this is an entertaining high-speed romp, with a happy taste of Bond movies from the camp Roger Moore era: flying automobiles, crunchy collisions, and some running-gag repeat appearances from minor characters. How long has it been since you saw an honest-to-God police-car pile-up?
